com.jdon.controller.cache
类 CacheManager

java.lang.Object
  com.jdon.controller.cache.CacheManager
所有已实现的接口：
org.picocontainer.Startable
public class CacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Startable

Cacahe Managerment Pattern Client objects request objects from a CacheManager object by calling its fetchObject method. The argument to the fetchObject method is an CacheKey object that identifies the object to fetch. The fetchObject method works by first calling the Cache objects fetchObject method. there is one CacheManager in jdon container, you can get it from the container, do not need create it.
